prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Pipe, Bass, Drums, Synth Pad, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features the sounds of Guitar, Pipe, Bass, Drums, and Synth Pad, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Pipe, Bass, Drums, and Synth Pad, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Guitar, Pipe, Bass, Drums, and Synth Pad, with no Piano.
